trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around August 19th 2009
Summary: Narrative below was based submitted by MUFON Dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness.
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness reported seeing a large, pulsating red light being circled in a clockwise direction by three smaller, white lights at an altitude described as "Just above cloud cover", and ESE of his house. He was shooting video, and when played back it showed several more lights surrounding the larger red light. All were circling it in a clockwise direction, while at the same time moving in unison toward the red light and then away from it, repeating this pattern for the duration of the sighting, which had already been in progress for about three hours when he called dispatch. Witness said his wife had filed a report (#18713) with MUFON last week detailing a similar sighting of four hours' duration, although I could find no record of it.
